name: Alliya Jayde Cunanan
title: Budtender
coverLetter: Hello, my name is Alliya Cunanan. You can call me by my first or middle name. Alliya or Jayde. I believe as an individual I am very responsible and dependable. I will offer and give the company all of me and I will definitely put my all into it. I become very passionate about things I get into and very quickly as well. I will definitely not disappoint. If its easier my number is (747)227-6533 and I my availability is very open at the moment. I can come in to train ASAP
experience: I worked at a shop for 2 months. And had the experience to learn how to Up-Sale patients, keep the cleanliness of the shop, fill up jars and keep the shop presentable.
additionalInfo: I became head bud tender within the first month
